entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:31 p.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -3.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 8:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 53 %

Dewpoint: -11.4°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
